definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: I don’t want to be too glib, however. There are a couple of key differences
sentences.chinese: 无论如何，我不想太油嘴滑舌。

sentences.english: Keep the best working status of the Fuel Injection Nozzle.
sentences.chinese: 保持喷油嘴最佳工作状态。
他是一个油嘴滑舌的推销员。

sentences.english: Insert draw rings will have Zerk Fitting to inject grease to each insert.
sentences.chinese: 拉伸环必须有油嘴对每个入块注射油脂。

sentences.english: The spray characteristics of the nozzle are specifically influenced by the micro-geometry of the spray holes.
sentences.chinese: 喷油嘴的喷雾特征主要受喷孔微小形状的影响。

sentences.english: He was tired of those mealy-mouthed politicians.
sentences.chinese: 他腻烦那些油嘴滑舌的政客。

sentences.english: Jim, ” he says, “I’m not buying your line of shit.”
sentences.chinese: 吉姆，”他说，“我才不相信你那油嘴滑舌的话呢。”

sentences.english: Glib has advanced production equipment and strong technical force.
sentences.chinese: 有先进的油嘴生产设备和雄厚的技术力量。
我恨那个油嘴滑舌的家伙。

sentences.english: I don't like those slippery salesmen.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢那些油嘴滑舌的推销员。

sentences.english: It presents a big issue with the injectors which is still pending to be solved.
sentences.chinese: 它与喷油嘴仍有待要解决的一个大问题。

sentences.english: We want to buy Fuel Injectors, please contact us.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要喷油嘴，请与我们联系。

sentences.english: I don't want to be too glib, however. There are a couple of key differences
sentences.chinese: 无论如何，我不想太油嘴滑舌。有两个关键区别

sentences.english: Oh look, there goes my gluttonous older brother smooth-talking again.
sentences.chinese: 瞧，我那贪吃的哥哥又开始油嘴滑舌了。

definition: valve (esp. tire valve)/accelerator (obsolete term for 油門|油门)/stigma (zool.)/spiracle
cylinder (of steam engine or internal combustion engine)
flippant and insincere (piece of writing or speech)/glib-tongued/oily
